about_the_game:
There is a war in hell too. Two factions of ghosts face each other. Pick your side and bring your army to glory!

As a commander of an army of fifteen ghosts is up to you to make right moves. Decide how many of your ghosts are on the battlefield and where you want to move them. In this "chess" like board game you have to think fast.

You can create a public lobby that can be joined by anybody in the world or create a private lobby and share the lobby password with your friend. You can also join an random existing lobby to show your strategy skills to others! Sweep out all enemy ghosts to claim the victory and have some fun!

HOW TO PLAY:
Once there are two players in a lobby, the game starts automatically. Creator of a lobby starts always as first and is commanding green ghosts.
1. Tap any window on your tower to open it.
2. Tap confirmation button to move one ghost from every opened window to first positions.
3. Once at least one ghost is outside tap scythe to choose direction of all your outside ghosts and tap confirm button to move.
4. Avoid black smoke!
5. Jump at your opponent position to defeat them.
6. Jump to opponent tower window to kill all enemy ghosts inside it and to move your ghost back to your tower.
7. Kill all enemy ghosts for victory!

Every player has 20 seconds only to make the move. Once the time is up you will loose your turn. You can skip your turn three times. Fourth means defeat!

Think carefully and fast!

GOOD LUCK!

Tip: While this is a PC version you can still play against players using android version of the game.
